html:
8.27.19  3:30 pm   what, in your estimation, are the properties human soul?

      we all try to demonstrate each and every moment

8.27.19  3:12 pm   regarding the drummers who just hammer away with their arm on their hi hat, i think sometimes it's a conscious choice to achieve a more consistent sound for each hit as opposed to accenting the strong beats. i'm a drummer and i can play Moeller style but for certain things i intenionally play with more arm to get that really rockin constant driving feel. but i think this can still be accomplished with mostly wrist usually and some drummers take it too far, either for a performance effect or just lack of technical knowledge 

      let's say the notes are going by at 4x 80bpm. so 16th notes at 80bpm, or 8th notes at 160 bpm. ..... does that change things

8.27.19  3:00 pm   Does the keyboard maestro app open upside down on your phone? I just got it, and it's weird, but it does that

      never used it on phone. my phone is from 2012. i mainly just use it as a light

8.27.19  2:52 pm   got any grapes

      i have 7 grapes

8.27.19  2:35 pm   have you ever worn air pods upside down?

      i already know from earpods it's all wrong. it is very specifically designed for the ear, which is not symmertrical in any way except opposed to the other one

      they don't

8.27.19  1:58 pm   i used to think that the world was meaningless, until i learned that i have to make my own meaning. have you made or found your meaning?

      everyone is making meaning. that's the only thing anyone is ever trying to do. it's a meaning factory up in here

      possibly 2 simulations

      hand shakes are not allowed in pyong yang. you must do synchronized dancing to greet each other

      yes

      seems likely

8.27.19  11:25 am   will you buy me a boat pls

      i will sell you a boat that can buy you more boats. it is a boat buying boat

8.27.19  9:55 am   Hi Bill.

I need your help.

Do you know of any website or app that tells you the chord you're playing based on what notes you've imputed?

For example: If I input "C E G B" the app or website would tell me it's Cmaj7.

I'm asking you this because there are some chords that I can play but I don't actually know the name of the chord.

You can help me with this first one. What chord is this: G# B D G. (With G# being the bass note)

      i would personally call that G/G# (G over G#)

8.27.19  9:46 am   is the past real?

      let me check, whoops too late

8.27.19  9:25 am   Do you ever suffer from apathy? How do you overcome it?

      the answer in those situations is that it's always a degree of confusion/misunderstanding causing it. something has been askew in the communication. the effect is shockingly paralyzing, and yet so easy to fix if you simply trace the line back and find the point where the communication went askew. then suddenly it seems like the whole town goes wild, it seems like

8.27.19  8:45 am   did you or have you ever struggled with attention and focus, or getting started on a project or a task?

      yes, the answer in those situations is that it's always a degree of confusion/misunderstanding causing it. something has been askew in the communication. the effect is shockingly paralyzing, and yet so easy to fix if you simply trace the line back and find the point where the communication went askew. then suddenly it seems like the whole town goes wild, it seems like

8.27.19  8:28 am   hey bill have you thought of incorporating an electronic drum kit to the repertoire

      prefer acoustic drums, electric keyboards. electric bass, ..... acoustic everything else

8.27.19  7:39 am   How do you contrast to other musicians

      i am actually very similar to very many musicians

8.27.19  7:16 am   Hey I was just wondering have you ever played Minecraft if so did you like it?

      do they allow circles yet

8.27.19  6:31 am   8.26.19  9:48 am you should totally do a talk show!! in my humble opinion

      i'm gonna see if i can get a floating desk. will still do it even if i can't get the desk, but will still try for a floating desk, fingers crossed

8.27.19  6:25 am   do you have a list of the various podcasts/ onterviews you've participated in?

      no

8.27.19  5:54 am   from 1-10 what tier do you think our current languages are when it comes to precise and efficient communication.

     the tier looks quite exponential. we are millions of times more efficient than we were at an earlier time, and one might be so bold to hypothesize that at a future time it could be even better

      Any specific language you suspect may be more efficient/precise than the average?

     it doesn't really matter what combinations of languages you use. it's all in how you use it

      What do you think tier 1 looked/sounded like, grunts and heavily reliant on body language?

     tier 1 was probably the 1 celled organism. was on that tier for like 5 billion years i think, actually

8.27.19  5:53 am   What is your favorite polychord?

      somewhere during alex honnold's final ascent, in the 2018 documentary film 'free solo'. Only full version of film has this part, during the final ascent. the previews and clips never play that part of the score

8.27.19  5:47 am   are you trying to avoid inspiring people in the "wrong" ways?

      i would like to inspire in the ways that are inspiring to me

      you can glitch up the side wall probably

      world is community

      peronal spirit

      a very interesting type of molecule

8.27.19  1:36 am   has anyone ever sent you a coded message that you decoded?

     quite frequently

      what did the message say?

     99% of them ask me if i can read the message

8.27.19  1:34 am   favorite ABBA moment?

      the only song i can think of is dancing queen, and i do appreciate the way they hit the dark bass riff half way through the verse. an interesting take on the theme, if you've only mostly heard the chorus in stores and never got a chance to really check out the verse, i think you discover that it's a real sturdy construction in there, what with that theme carrying you through the verse, pre cho and up to the chorus which of course we have all heard in the retail environment for centuries now

      17:08

      interrupt them and call them something. maybe even the same thing, give them a taste

      oh you are in luck, i am reinventing all my super powers into something a little more mega/ultra

      Places!!!!!!!
